text: This is a list of all transactions occurring in the 1980-81 NBA season. ==Events== If you want to see the transaction events (from May 13, 1980 to June 20, 1981), see the links below ==External links== *Basketball.RealGM.com *Basketball-Reference.com ==References== Transactions 1980-81
title: List of 1980–81 NBA season transactions
